qas.question: When did the Coastal Road Massacre occur?
Where were the PLO bases located?

context: On <a0_0>11 March 1978<a0_0/>, a PLO guerilla raid from Lebanon led to the Coastal Road Massacre. Israel responded by launching an invasion of southern Lebanon to destroy the PLO bases <a2_0>south of the Litani River<a2_0/>. Most PLO fighters withdrew, but <a1_0>Israel<a1_0/> was able to secure southern Lebanon until a UN force and the Lebanese army could take over. The PLO soon resumed its policy of attacks against Israel. In the next few years, the PLO infiltrated the south and kept up a sporadic shelling across the border. Israel carried out numerous retaliatory attacks by air and on the ground.
